reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress gorgeous and flattering, particularly on curvy shapes, with one noting it hits right below the knees. The dress is comfortable, not itchy at all, and features a soft, luxurious material that's super stretchy. They appreciate its quality, with one customer mentioning it's perfect for winter wear, while another notes how it gently hugs the waist and hips.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute perfection
items.body: I am in LOVE with this dress. Itâ€™s so comfortable and so pretty. With a large bust sometimes itâ€™s hard to find a dress that flatters you but this fit it all the right places. The slits on the side are really cute. I want this in every color! Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 OUT OF 10
items.body: The material is nice, thick, and it looks great. I usually wear a medium, but had to get a large so it can have some give...especially where the arms should have that "baggy" look. I felt sexy and comfortably in this dress. It is a DEEP V, so I sewed mine at the top a bit. I already bought a second color. Very figure flattering and hides your pooch a little. Read more
items.author: Ali

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Calling all Girls Who Wear Coverups
items.body: Like the title says, any girl, woman, person who wears cover ups over top of their dresses or outfits because they feel self conscious- give this dress a try. This is the first time I've worn a dress sans little sweater to hide underneath, and it felt good. The dress hugs your curves, sits nicely above the knee, has comfort room for the upper arm and has room in the bust without being baggy if you have a smaller chest as I do. I will say if you are taller, like I am (5'9.5) the slits will sit a bit higher on your thigh, but it doesn't ride up. This dress comes with a removable belt (without sewn in belt loops ðŸ™ðŸ™) and looks good with Or without it, but I think the belt adds a little something since I have a lower waist than most clothes are made to compensate, so it gave me a chance to cinch it right where I felt comfortable. This is the first time where I've felt really comfortable in a dress, especially since I wore a medium which is usually my size, but occasionally uncomfortable since medium fits my top but not always my bottom in dresses. This was perfect, stretchy and not see through. Definitely give this dress a try, at least have it in your collection for a cute stress free date night dress that you can just throw on and feel beautiful in. Even feeling my worst, pre-period body, I felt very beautiful and confident wearing it. Read more
items.author: Leah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and not itchy / form fitting / true to size
items.body: Material feels like youâ€™re wearing a big comfy sweater very soft however, if youâ€™re not looking for something very fitted, I donâ€™t recommend. I am six months (LG size) pregnant and bought for my bridal shower. I just feel like it makes my butt look too big and reveals too much of my curves for the type of look Iâ€™m going for for my baby shower so Iâ€™m returning based on that. However if your looking for a cute dress for a nice dinner or holiday party while pregnant and want to look a little bit more spicy than I recommend getting this dress! I also liked it better without the soft built included with dress. Read more
items.author: Angela Hammond

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!!
items.body: Absolute perfection! Itâ€™s so soft and stretchy- very flattering. Buy it, you wonâ€™t regret it!! Read more
items.author: Dee M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress for Christmas
items.body: Stunning dress! Purchased for a Christmas party and it was perfect. Soft material, great fit, true to size, perfect thickness. I couldnâ€™t be happier with it! Read more
items.author: Ceci

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking and good quality.
items.body: Bought this for a holiday party and the fit is amazing. Turning heads and happy I purchased! I have 2 colors. Read more
items.author: Jessica K

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small/not stretchy
items.body: Runs a little small. The dress is a soft material and a beautiful color just not what I was looking for. It also came just below my knee which I wasnâ€™t a fan of. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Rust, Z-valentine-red, Z-valentine-pink, Apricot, Coffee, Z-valentine-black, 1-army Green, Dark Green, Red, 1-black, Navy, 1-blue, 1-dark Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
